subject: Re: Thanks, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
 
$342,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this simplified form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://stelziuxister.com/
